chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! I am the navigator. Please give me your instructions on how to proceed on the map. What do you see around the starting point?
at the start I see a map, the next island has a tiger
Great! I see the tiger on the next island. To which direction should I navigate from here?
continue straight and take a left once on land

Alright! I will continue straight and take a left once I reach the next island. Here I go...

*proceeds straight and takes a left*

I have reached the island after taking a left. What do you see next?
I see a parrot, go around it by passing the elephant then continue straight till you see a frog

Got it! I will go around the parrot by passing the elephant and then continue straight until I see a frog.

*goes around the parrot by passing the elephant and continues straight*

I have reached the island with the frog. What's next?
you will make a uturn. and continue straight where you will pass an alligator

Understood! I will make a U-turn from the frog and continue straight until I pass an alligator.

*makes a U-turn and continues straight*

I have passed the alligator. What should I do next?
continue straight till you see a small boulder, once you cross you will see a giraffe

Got it! I will continue straight until I see a small boulder and then I will cross it to find the giraffe.

*continues straight and crosses the small boulder*

I have crossed the small boulder. And there it is! I see the giraffe. What do I do next?
continue straight till you see a snake

Alright! I will continue straight until I see a snake.

*continues straight*

I have reached the snake. What should I do next?
continue straight and you have reaches the treasure chest

Great! I will continue straight from the snake, and I have reached the treasure chest!

*reaches the treasure chest*

Hooray! I have found the treasure chest. *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hi

Hello! Welcome to the map navigation game. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. Let's begin our journey. What do you see around you? Can you describe your surroundings?
I see a dog
Great, you're in the right place! Now, we need to head west, just below a wooden bench. Can you find the wooden bench? Please let me know when you're there.
I am here
Awesome! Now, from the wooden bench, we need to u-turn left and cross the trail in front of you. Once you're across, head back towards the white dog. Let me know when you've reached the white dog.
ive reached the white dog
Excellent! Now, near the white dog, there is a wooden branch crossing a river. Can you spot it? Let me know once you're at the wooden branch.
ive reached the wooden branch
Perfect! Now, we need to cross over the branch and go south. Keep heading down the map. Let me know when you see a white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic.
ive reached the white dog with the picnic
Great job! Now, we want to go over the red and white checkered picnic, touching a bowl of berries. After that, we'll continue west. Let me know when you're ready to move on.
I am ready

Fantastic! Now, after the picnic, we come across another wooden branch that crosses the river. This time, we need to cross the branch to the north. Can you find the wooden branch and cross over it? Let me know when you've done that.
ive crossed

Well done! After crossing the branch, the path continues northward. But we need to circle around a green bush without touching it. Circle around the bush from the right side until you reach a florist stand. Let me know once you're at the florist stand.
I am in. front
Great progress! Now, we need to go west, below the florist stand. Keep going until you reach a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Let me know when you're at the bridge.
I am over the bridge
Fantastic! Just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Let me know when you've passed the bench.
ive reached the newspaper stand

Great job! Now, we want to go south, but between the old people and another wooden branch. Once you pass between them, you'll see a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch. Let me know when you're at the green bush.
I am at the green busg
Awesome! Now, we need to go east, between the branch and the bush. Take a few steps to the east and let me know what you see.
I see a deer

Fantastic! You've made it to the final objective. Congratulations! You've successfully followed the path and reached the brown young deer. Well done! Thank you for playing the map navigation game. I hope you had fun exploring the map. If you'd like to play again or have any other questions, feel free to let me know. Have a great day!
thank you, you swell
You're welcome! I'm glad you enjoyed the game. Thank you for the kind words. If you have any more questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with, feel free to ask. Have a swell day too!
thank you
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help. If you have any more questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
you as well
Thank you! Take care and have a great day ahead!
bye
Goodbye! Take care and have a great day! Feel free to come back anytime if you need assistance.

chat.msg: Welcome!
hi
Hello! I'm the navigator. Where would you like to go on the map first?
what do you see need you?

As the navigator, I see a map with various objects. Starting from the north, I see a tent. South of the tent, there is a dog sitting to the left of a fire. To the right of the fire, there is a red mushroom. Continuing south, we come across a blue car. Further south, there is a blue telescope. West of the telescope, there are rocks surrounding a wooden house. 

Let me know which direction you'd like to go or if you have any specific instructions on how we should proceed.
I would first like to go to the dog

Understood! To get to the dog, I will head south from the tent. 

I am now at the dog. What should our next move be?
the fire

Got it! I will now go to the fire, which is to the right of the dog.

I have arrived at the fire. What's the next step?
the car

Thank you for the instruction! I will proceed to the blue car, which is located south of the fire.

I have now reached the blue car. What should I do next?
find the telescope

Understood! To find the telescope, I will continue south from the blue car.

I have arrived at the blue telescope. What should be our next move?
the cabin

Great! To find the cabin, I will now head west from the blue telescope.

I have reached the wooden cabin. 

*finished*.

We have successfully reached the final object on the map. Is there anything else you would like to do on the map or any other instructions you have?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hi
Hello! Are you ready to navigate through our map?
yes
Great! Let's get started. Look around you and describe what you see near your current location.
I see palm trees
Excellent! Do you see a group of three palm trees nearby?
yes
Perfect! Now, I want you to go under the first palm tree to the southwest. Let me know when you're there.
I am here
Great job! Now, take a right turn and cross the second palm tree. Let me know when you've done that.
I'm done
Fantastic! Now, make a sharp left turn before the third palm tree and start moving southward. Keep me updated on your progress.
I am done
Well done! Now, as you continue southward, you will see a brown puppy on your left. Describe what you see when you're next to the puppy.
I see rocks
Good observation! After the brown puppy, take a slight left turn and then turn right, heading to the south. Let me know when you've made that turn.
I see a ball
Great! Keep going in that direction. As you continue, you'll come across a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right. Can you see them?
yes
Perfect! Now, can you describe what you see ahead of you, after passing the rocks?
a crab
Wonderful! When you reach the crab, turn right (west) and start moving along the big rock. Let me know when you've made that turn.
I made it
Fantastic! As you continue westward along the big rock, you will come across a third rock, this one of medium size. Describe what you see when you reach that point.
a shark
Great observation! Now, it's time to make a sharp right turn, away from the shark. Let me know when you've made the turn.
I made ir
Perfect! Now, after making the right turn, you will leave the water and head back to land. Look for a blue-yellow-white ball and a medium-sized rock. Can you locate them?
yes
Wonderful! Now, go between the medium-sized rock and the blue-yellow-white ball, and continue moving north. Let me know when you've done that.
a kayak

Great job! After going between the medium-sized rock and the blue-yellow-white ball, you will see a red kayak ahead of you. When you reach the kayak, take a right turn (west) and stay along its side. Let me know when you've done that.
im done
Excellent! Now that you've taken the right turn and are moving alongside the red kayak, continue heading west. Let me know when you see a small green bush ahead of you.
I see it
Fantastic! You're almost there. Now, take a 90-degree turn to your right (north) and follow along the small green bush. This is your final objective. Let me know when you've reached it.
ive reached it
Congratulations! You did a great job navigating the map and following the instructions. Well done! I hope you enjoyed the journey. If you have any more adventures in mind, feel free to let me know.
thank you
You're very welcome! It was my pleasure to guide you through the map. If you have any other questions or need assistance with anything else, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
you too
Thank you! Take care and have a wonderful day!
bye now
Goodbye! Take care and have a great day ahead!

general_survey.answer: I think they are just comfortable with both
